WorkItemConfigurationTransformationItem.TransformationXml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <!-- This transformation updates the MSF for Agile Software Development 6.0 "User Story" definition to v6.2 --> <!-- See http://blogs.msdn.com/b/visualstudioalm/archive/2013/04/04/upgrade-your-2012-process-template-from-rtm-to-update-2.aspx for details --> <Witd:WITD xmlns:Witd="http://schemas.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/2008/workitemtracking/typedef" xmlns:xdt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/XML-Document-Transform"> <WORKITEMTYPE> <WORKFLOW> <TRANSITIONS> <!-- Add missing transitions --> <!-- First remove the transitions if they exist to make this script idempotent --> <!-- Then insert the transitions at the end --> <TRANSITION from="Resolved" to="New" xdt:Transform="Remove" xdt:Locator="Match(from,to)" /> <TRANSITION from="Resolved" to="New" xdt:Transform="Insert"> <REASONS> <DEFAULTREASON value="Moved to the backlog" /> </REASONS> </TRANSITION> <TRANSITION from="Closed" to="New" xdt:Transform="Remove" xdt:Locator="Match(from,to)" /> <TRANSITION from="Closed" to="New" xdt:Transform="Insert"> <REASONS> <DEFAULTREASON value="Moved to the backlog" /> </REASONS> </TRANSITION> <TRANSITION from="New" to="Closed" xdt:Transform="Remove" xdt:Locator="Match(from,to)" /> <TRANSITION from="New" to="Closed" xdt:Transform="Insert"> <REASONS> <DEFAULTREASON value="Acceptance tests pass" /> </REASONS> <FIELDS> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ActivatedDate"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="clock" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ActivatedBy"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="currentuser" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="clock" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="currentuser" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ClosedDate"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="clock" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ClosedBy"> <SERVERDEFAULT from="currentuser" /> </FIELD> </FIELDS> </TRANSITION> <!-- Set the values in the ResolvedBy and ResolvedDate fields in the transition "Active to Closed" --> <TRANSITION from="Active" to="Closed" xdt:Locator="Match(from,to)"> <FIELDS> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)"> <READONLY xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <SERVERDEFAULT from="clock" xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <SERVERDEFAULT from="clock" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> </FIELD> <FIELD refname="Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)"> <ALLOWEXISTINGVALUE xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <READONLY xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <SERVERDEFAULT from="currentuser" xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <SERVERDEFAULT from="currentuser" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> </FIELD> </FIELDS> </TRANSITION> <!-- Update the reasons in the transitions "Active to New" and "Active to Closed" --> <TRANSITION from="Active" to="New" xdt:Locator="Match(from,to)"> <REASONS> <DEFAULTREASON xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <REASON xdt:Transform="RemoveAll" /> <REASON value="Implementation halted" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> <DEFAULTREASON value="Moved to the backlog" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> </REASONS> </TRANSITION> <TRANSITION from="Active" to="Closed" xdt:Locator="Match(from,to)"> <REASONS> <DEFAULTREASON xdt:Transform="Remove" /> <REASON xdt:Transform="RemoveAll" /> <REASON value="Abandoned" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> <REASON value="Out of scope" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> <REASON value="Rejected" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> <DEFAULTREASON value="Acceptance tests pass" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> </REASONS> </TRANSITION> </TRANSITIONS> </WORKFLOW> </WORKITEMTYPE> </Witd:WITD>

WorkItemConfigurationTransformationItem.Description: TFS2012.0 or TFS2012.1 to TFS2012.2 - Agile Configuration
WorkItemConfigurationTransformationItem.TransformationXml: <?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- This transformation updates the Agile Configuration from TFS 2012.0 or TFS 2012.1 to TFS 2012.2 --> <!-- See http://blogs.msdn.com/b/visualstudioalm/archive/2013/04/04/upgrade-your-2012-process-template-from-rtm-to-update-2.aspx for details --> <AgileProjectConfiguration xmlns:xdt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/XML-Document-Transform"> <ProductBacklog> <Columns> <!-- First remove the Tags column if it exists to make this script idempotent --> <Column refname="System.Tags" xdt:Transform="Remove" xdt:Locator="Match(refname)" /> <!-- Insert the Tags column at the end --> <Column width="200" refname="System.Tags" xdt:Transform="Insert" /> </Columns> </ProductBacklog> </AgileProjectConfiguration>
